author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: Allows you to let one property follow the changes of another property
name: Followers

Ignore missing properties.description: It can happen that a follower rule no longer works because one of the properties is not available (yet). By default a missing property will cause the follower rule to be disabled. If you want to ignore missing properties, check this box.

Websocket host.description: Advanced. The websocket hostname. The default is 'localhost'.

Websocket port.description: Advanced. The websocket port. The default is 8080.

Authorization token.description: Advanced. To be allowed to get information on all your devices, this addon needs an 'authorization' code. Normally this is done automaticallty. It's basically a very long password. If you prefer you can generate it yourself under Settings -> Developer -> Create local authorization

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
